globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
With little time to stop a deal with the Empire, you forge ahead into the mercenary hideout.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door to the Hall is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.theText: Confirming your fear, you see mercenaries and Imperials already working side by side as guards. A pair of Rodian mercenaries points their guns at you.

The negotiations are apparently already taking place. You need to find and stop them before it is too late.

{-} The deal will complete at the end of Round 5 if the door to the Back Room is closed.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Back Room opens ({V}) or when the deal is completed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Find the room where the deal is taking place.

{-} The door to the Hall is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The deal will complete at the end of Round 5 if the door to the Back Room is closed.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Back Room opens ({V}) or when the deal is completed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Beating back oncoming mercenaries and Imperials, you finally manage to slice their console as they bear down on you. You scramble as much data from their deal as you can, hopefully disrupting this deadly alliance.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The overwhelming combination of both mercenaries and Imperials proves too great and you are forced to retreat. You return to your shuttle and fearfully begin lo create contingency plans for dealing with this new, powerful alliance.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Unyielding
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the door lies an old factory area, with machinery strewn about. In the back, a door leads into a back room. Voices can be heard from behind the door.

entityProperties.name: Hall Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads deeper into the mercenary hideout.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.theText: Enemy forces are already waiting for you.

{-} The deal will complete at the end of Round 5 if the door to the Back Room is closed.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Back Room opens ({V}) or when the deal is completed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
How many <color="red">Hired Gun</color> figures are on the map?

globalEvents.name: Hired Gun 1
globalEvents.eventText:
Reinforcements arrive for the Rodian mercenaries.

{-} Reinforce 1 <color="red">Hired Gun</color> figure adjacent to the other figure of its group.

globalEvents.name: Hired Gun 2
globalEvents.eventText:
The Rodian mercenaries move into position and raise their weapons.

{-} Each <color="red">Hired Gun</color> figure becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

entityProperties.name: Back Room Door
entityProperties.theText: A simple door leads into the back room of the hideout. Voices can be heard from inside. The negotiations are in progress.

eventActions.theText: A man in the uniform of an Imperial officer is standing at a table in the back room, accompanied by two Trandoshan bounty hunters. They all turn in your direction.
The three negotiators are accompanied by more goons.
A datapad is lying on the table. It should contain the records and data from the deal.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The datapad contains all the records and data concerning the deal.

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to try and download the data ({J} or {I}).

eventActions.theText:
{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to try and download the data ({J} or {I}).
{-} The Rebels win when all data packages have been downloaded.
Download the data. Data packages left: &Data Package&

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to try and download the data ({J} or {I}).
{-} The Rebels win when all data packages have been downloaded.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Forged Alliance
globalEvents.eventText: Cheering erupts from behind the back room door as the Empire and the mercenaries conclude their agreement. Soon after, the door flies open.

globalEvents.name: Open Back Room Door
globalEvents.eventText: You burst through the door into the back room to disrupt the dealing parties, or at least to intercept their records and data.

globalEvents.name: Deal Complete
globalEvents.eventText:
The concluded deal has given your enemies confidence and strength.

{-} The <color="red">Imperial Officer</color> and the Trandoshan Hunters become <color="red">Focused</color>.

globalEvents.name: Hired Gun Deployment
globalEvents.eventText: More Rodian mercenaries rush in.

eventActions.theText: What is the threat level of this mission?

You start to download the data from the datapad.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Enter the number of successed below.

inputList.theText: The encryption is too strong. You don't manage to download any data.

globalEvents.name: Download Data 1
globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.name: Download Data 6
globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

globalEvents.eventText: You manage to download some data packages.

entityProperties.name: Hall Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into a hallway and deeper into the mercenary hideout.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack it (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 {G}).

The datapad contains all the records and data concerning the deal.

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal to try and download the data ({J} or {I}).
